ProFTPD with no version info, super short form

fingerprint.pattern: ^(?:\d{4}\-\d\d\-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d,\d\d\d )?(\S{1,512}) proftpd\[\d+\]: error: no valid servers configured
fingerprint.example: ftp.host.com proftpd[40312]: error: no valid servers configured\n
2016-10-31 12:14:35,524 hostname.com proftpd[26992]: error: no valid servers configured\n

fingerprint.description: ProFTPD with version info but no obvious OS info, take 2
Pure-FTPd versions <= 1.0.13 (at least as far back as 1.0.11)
Pure-FTPd versions >= 1.0.14 - Config data can be zero or more of: [privsep] [TLS]
Serv-U Serv-U with version on Windows
fingerprint.example: Serv-U FTP-Server v2.5n for WinSock ready...
Serv-U FTP Server v6.0 for WinSock ready

fingerprint.description: Common FTP banner modification to look like Serv-U -- assert nothing.
